author: @kbtxnews
title: Malone Named to SEC Community Service Team
text: Malone Named to SEC Community Service Team BIRMINGHAM ‚Äì Texas A&M women‚Äôs basketball player Jada Malone was named to the 2024 SEC Community Service Team for her contributions to the local Brazos Valley community, the league announced Thursday. Malone has been an active participant in Aggies CAN which is an organization that has grown into the largest student-athlete volunteer run canned food drive in the nation. The collections for Aggies CAN are given back to families and organizations to help impact the Bryan-College Station area. The Spring, Texas, native is also the president of We3 (We Cubed). The organization seeks to encourage, equip and empower female student-athlete during their career at Texas A&M. Malone is an integral piece for the Texas A&M REVved Up to Read Program which allows student-athletes to visit with young students in the area to read a book and talk about the importance of literacy and education. Additionally, Malone has been the women‚Äôs basketball representative for the Aggies for the past two years at the SEC Basketball Leadership Council. This marks the first community service honor for the junior. She was also involved in the women‚Äôs basketball team bike build that donated over 125 bikes and helmets to children in Aggieland over the holiday season. The Aggies return to Reed Arena for their final game of the regular season against the Alabama Crimson Tide on Sunday, March 3 at 2 p.m., where they will also honor their seniors on Senior Day. Copyright 2024 KBTX. All rights reserved.

author: T13
title: La reacci√≥n de ped√≥filos al ser descubiertos pidiendo fotos a ni√±os | T13
text: [Reportajes T13](https://www.t13.cl/reportajest13) logr√≥ acceder al modus operandi de varios ped√≥filos que se contactaban con ni√±os y ni√±as por internet gracias a videojuegos. Los individuos hablaban con los menores y les ped√≠an fotos √≠ntimas. Haci√©ndose pasar por menores de edad, periodistas de T13 contactaron a los ped√≥filos, quienes les comenzaron a pedir fotos √≠ntimas a trav√©s de los mensajes. Un individuo asegur√≥ ser peruano pero estar viviendo en Francia. El sujeto le ofreci√≥ dinero virtual, que se utiliza en el videojuego Free Fire, a cambio de realizar acciones sexuales a trav√©s de una videollamada. "Depende de lo que hagas. Si haces... el esto... y te tocas as√≠, ser√≠an 5.000 (diamantes, monedas del Free Fire)", solicit√≥ el individuo. [ Lee Tambi√©n ](/noticia/nacional/nos-hicieron-sacarnos-chaleco-exconscriptos-huamachuco-relatan-lo-ocurrio-march-6-5-2024) "Nos hicieron sacarnos el chaleco": Exconscriptos de Huamachuco relatan lo que ocurri√≥ en marcha donde muri√≥ soldado Tras esto, el sujeto fue encarado por periodistas de T13. La reacci√≥n del individuo fue simplemente guardar silencio, para despu√©s de unos segundos cortar la videollamada. En otro caso expuesto en Reportajes T13, apareci√≥ un sujeto de nacionalidad boliviana, quien aseguraba que ten√≠a 18 a√±os y ofrec√≠a recompensas para un videojuego, pero con la condici√≥n de que la supuesta menor de edad se quite la ropa durante la videollamada. Al momento de ser encarado, el individuo se mostr√≥ sorprendido, apag√≥ su c√°mara y, posteriormente, decidi√≥ cortar la llamada. Seg√∫n se conoci√≥ durante el reportaje, la situaci√≥n ha ocurrido en distintos videojuegos, tales como Roblox, Fortnite, Minecraft o League of Legends, las cuales ser√≠an las m√°s recurrentes. [S√≠guenos en ](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiEOgjh55R1O_OHSPw0T00iXYqFAgKIhDoI4eeUdTvzh0j8NE9NIl2)

author: Anna McGuinness
title: NSW grower breaks Guinness World Record for heaviest blueberry | Daily Liberal | Dubbo, NSW
text: A NSW berry farm has grown the world's heaviest blueberry. Weighing 20.40 grams and measuring 39.31 millimetres, the fruit has officially broken the [Guinness World Record title](https://www.guinnessworldrecords.com/world-records/heaviest-blueberry) set in 2020 by a 16.20 gram Western Australian blueberry. The record-breaking blueberry was picked at Costa Berries' farm in Corindi, on the Mid North Coast, in November 2023 and grown by Brad Hocking, Jessica Scalzo and Marie-France Courtois. Mr Hocking said the blueberry was from the Eterna variety which is known for its large fruit size, crisp texture and long shelf life. "When we picked this one there were probably around 20 other berries of a similar size," he said. "This really is a delightful piece of fruit. "While the fruit is large, there's absolutely no compromise on quality or flavour as would be expected when developing a premium variety blueberry." The Costa Group said its variety improvement program develops one or two new varieties of blueberries on average each year. It licenses Costa bred varieties overseas such as the Americas, Morocco, China and south east Africa. Sign up for our newsletter to stay up to date. We care about the protection of your data. Read our [Privacy Policy](/privacy/).

author: Editorial staff
title: Lorain teen singer\/songwriter Mason Mitchell to release first single 'i love you i'm sorry' on New Year's Day
text:
Things To Do Music and Concerts Music and Concerts | Lorain teen singer/songwriter Mason Mitchell to release first single ‚Äòi love you i‚Äôm sorry‚Äô on New Year‚Äôs Day Teen artist turns pain into triumph through new single Share this: Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Click to share on X (Opens in new window) Lorain teen artist Mason Mitchell will release his first single ‚Äúi love you i‚Äôm sorry‚Äù on New Year‚Äôs Day. (Submitted) By Editorial staff | news@morningjournal.com PUBLISHED: December 26, 2024 at 5:30 PM EST Lorain teen artist Mason Mitchell is set to release his first single, according to a news release.
Mason, a student of Jaclyn Bradley at RockTown Music Academy in downtown Lorain, will release ‚Äúi love you i‚Äôm sorry‚Äù on New Year‚Äôs Day, the release said.
The15-year-old and has been singing as long as he remembers, according to the release.
Mason also has been preforming on stage for years with MAD* Factory Theater Co and Lorain Palace Youth Theatre.
‚ÄúRecently I‚Äôve realized that I find acting to be work, even when it‚Äôs for fun,‚Äù he said in the release. ‚ÄúBut, singing is always the thing I turn back to.‚Äù
In 2021, Mason had to go through a procedure that is commonly known, but isn‚Äôt understood, according to the release.
‚ÄúWhen I was 11 years old, I had to have a complete spinal fusion due to scoliosis,‚Äù he said.
Mason went on to explain that many people do not understand how emotionally trying a surgery of that kind can be, the release said.
He stated that many times he would cry, not knowing if things as simple as putting on a pair of shoes would be simple again.
Since then, Mason said he always would include something into his music: vulnerability, the release said.
‚ÄúWhen you are making music that you want people to listen to, and feel a connection to, you have to be vulnerable,‚Äù Mason said. ‚ÄúPeople have to feel what you felt in the moment.‚Äù
He said he strives to help people with his music.
Mason adds he wants people to feel like no matter what they are going through, whether it is a breakup or something larger, that they can turn to his music and be allowed to just feel.
Mason‚Äôs song ‚Äúi love you i‚Äôm sorry‚Äù will be available on all streaming platforms Jan. 1 as the ball drops and begins a new year, according to the release.
Pre-saving for ‚Äúi love you i‚Äôm sorry,‚Äù which is the action of saving a song to a person‚Äôs library before it is released, starts Dec. 27 through links on Mason‚Äôs social media @masonmitchellmusic.

author: Angelo Guinhawa Athlon Sports
title: NBA Announces Exciting Cade Cunningham News, Fans React
text:
Sports
NBA Announces Exciting Cade Cunningham News, Fans React
The Detroit Pistons have really turned their franchise around. After finishing at the bottom of the Eastern Conference standings in the past two seasons, they are now in contention for an automatic playoff spot.
Entering Wednesday's game against the Miami Heat, Detroit boasts a 38-31 record for the sixth seed in the East. They are five games ahead of the seventh-seeded Atlanta Hawks, giving them a pretty good cushion amid their postseason bid.
Sure enough, however, the Pistons wouldn't have had that much success had it not been for their superstar, Cade Cunningham.
Cunningham has been sensational so far this 2024-25 season, even making his first All-Star Game. He has averaged 25.6 points, 6.0 rebounds and 9.3 assists through 64 outings so far this campaign.
Furthermore, the NBA announced on Wednesday before the Pistons-Heat clash that Cunningham is actually just the third player in league history to have at least 4,300 points, 1,000 rebounds and 1,400 assists in their first 200 games.
NBA legend Oscar Robertson and now Los Angeles Lakers star Luka Doncic are the other two.
"DETROIT'S MOTORCADE," the NBA wrote on X. "Cade Cunningham joined Oscar Robertson (1960-63) & Luka Donƒçiƒá (2018-21) as the ONLY players to tally at least 4,300 PTS, 1,000 REB, and 1,400 AST through their first 200 games!"
DETROIT'S MOTORCADE.
‚Äî NBA (@NBA)
Cade Cunningham joined Oscar Robertson (1960-63) & Luka Donƒçiƒá (2018-21) as the ONLY players to tally at least 4,300 PTS, 1,000 REB, and 1,400 AST through their first 200 games![pic.twitter.com/lVYjcvMv5K][March 19, 2025]
Naturally, the news stirred excitement among fans, with many heaping praise on the young guard.
"Cade Cunningham is in elite company," a commenter wrote. Another one said, "Cade Cunningham is driving full speed ahead in Detroit!"
"The future is looking bright for Detroit's star," a fan added.
"This is epic!" a follower shared, along with a fire emoji.
"Cunningham is insane," a poster noted. A social media user further stated, "That's very impressive."
"This is greatness," a seventh supporter said.
Cade Cunningham has certainly proven in this 2024-25 season that he deserves to be in the conversation among the league's best players today. And at 23 years old, he definitely has plenty of room to grow.
As fans have said, the future is looking great for Cunningham and the Pistons.
Related: Slow-Mo Video of Cole Anthony's Dangerous Collision With Jaden Ivey Emerges
Copyright 2025 The Arena Group, Inc. All Rights Reserved
This story was originally published March 19, 2025 at 6:53 PM.

author: Diario La Tribuna
title: Ama a tu pareja
text: Ama a tu pareja Por: Jos√© Mar√≠a Leiva Leiva Dentro de los mensajes recibidos en estas festividades navide√±as, me place compartir una reflexi√≥n en torno al amor y cuidado que la pareja debe darse para permanecer unidos hasta el final de sus d√≠as. Se trata de un texto corto, pero de un significado profundo, valioso, que se√±ala: ‚ÄúCuida a tu pareja. Tus hijos se van. Tus padres se van. Tus amigos se van. El dinero se acaba. El cuerpo cambia. Al final solo ser√°n los dos‚Äù. Veamos ahora por partes, dicho enunciado. Tus hijos se van. Empecemos diciendo que nosotros como pareja, un d√≠a abandonamos el nido, el hogar formado por nuestros progenitores, y a su vez, ellos hicieron lo mismo en relaci√≥n a sus padres‚Ä¶ y as√≠ ha sido y ser√° siempre en forma sucesiva. Desde luego, raz√≥n no le falta a Khalil Gibr√°n, el poeta y fil√≥sofo liban√©s, cuando en un apretado resumen de su poema, dice: ‚ÄúTus hijos no son tus hijos, son hijos e hijas de la vida ansiando vivir por s√≠ mismos‚Ä¶ T√∫ eres el arco del cual tus hijos como flechas vivas son lanzados. Deja que la inclinaci√≥n en tu mano de arquero sea para la felicidad‚Äù. En mi caso, de mis tres hijos, dos ya est√°n casados y tienen su propia descendencia, y el tercero vive en el extranjero. Tus padres se van. Por supuesto, un d√≠a desaparecen f√≠sicamente. De hecho, por cuesti√≥n de edad y precedencia, esto es lo que suele ocurrir, pero ojo, no necesariamente, pues a veces toca el infortunio y son los hijos quienes primero recorren ese ignoto camino. En este apartado, mis padres ya descansan en paz y conf√≠o, que puedan gozar de la vida eterna. A prop√≥sito, ¬øqu√© pasa cuando se abrazan el amor y la muerte? ¬øSe muere el amor? ¬øO se enamora la muerte? Tal vez la muerte morir√≠a enamorada y el amor amar√≠a hasta la muerte. En todo caso, nunca mejor dicho, ese pensamiento aborigen australiano: ‚ÄúTodos estamos de visita en este momento y lugar. Solo estamos de paso. Hemos venido a observar, aprender, crecer, amar y volver a casa‚Äù. Tus amigos se van. Ya sea porque fallecen, o, por el contrario, se van apartando de nuestra vida, con o sin raz√≥n, en este √∫ltimo caso, porque ya no les interesa mantener la amistad. Y en este punto tengo claro que, si alguien quiere entrar a tu vida, que entre. Si alguien quiere salir de tu vida, que salga. Pero no permitas que se queden en la puerta‚Ä¶ porque estorban. De hecho, muchas son las personas que cambian con el tiempo‚Ä¶ o el tiempo te muestra lo que en realidad son. Igual, te prometen estar ah√≠ para lo que necesites, pero mira a tu alrededor a ver cu√°ntos lo han cumplido. Al final, esto tiene su propia moraleja, y es que algunas personas pasan por nuestras vidas para ense√±arnos a no ser como ellas. Acaso ser√° por ello, que de vez en cuando sea necesario sacudir el √°rbol de la amistad para derribar la fruta podrida. El dinero se acaba. Es como una llave abierta, sobre todo, si no sabes administrarlo bien. El cuerpo cambia‚Ä¶ El paso de los a√±os es inexorable, no solo porque ahora peinas canas o se te arruga la piel, sino lo que es peor, te enfrentas con los achaques propios de la edad‚Ä¶ Sobre este particular viene a mi memoria la siguiente f√°bula del poeta y escritor colombiano, Luis Alberto Padilla Pardo: ‚ÄúUna vez decid√≠ dar un paseo debajo de mi cama para preguntarles a los monstruos de mi infancia por qu√© ya no me visitaban por las noches como antes. Cuando finalmente los encontr√©, les dije: Viejos amigos, ¬øc√≥mo est√°n? ¬øPor qu√© ya no me visitan? ¬°S ! Se supone que ya no debes hablarnos. Ya no eres un ni√±o, ahora eres un adulto. Me secaron las l√°grimas que se desbordaban de mis ojos y se despidieron diciendo: Te tocar√° duro a partir de ahora, porque los monstruos m√°s feroces estar√°n haciendo ruido dentro de ti‚Äù. Al final solo ser√°n los dos. Ilustr√©moslo con un relato. ‚ÄúUn esposo fue a visitar a un sabio consejero y le dijo que ya no quer√≠a a su esposa y que pensaba separarse. El sabio lo escuch√≥, lo mir√≥ a los ojos y solamente le dijo una palabra: √Åmala, luego guard√≥ silencio. Pero es que ya no siento nada por ella. √Åmala, repuso el sabio. Y ante el desconcierto del se√±or, despu√©s de un oportuno silencio, el viejo sabio agreg√≥ lo siguiente: Amar es una decisi√≥n, no un sentimiento; Amar es dedicaci√≥n y entrega, amar es un verbo y el fruto de esa acci√≥n es el amor‚Äù. ‚ÄúEl Amor es un ejercicio de jardiner√≠a: arranque lo que le puede hacer da√±o a su jard√≠n, prepare el terreno, siembre, sea paciente, riegue y cuide. Est√© preparado porque habr√° plagas, sequ√≠as o excesos de lluvias, m√°s no por eso abandone su jard√≠n. Ame a su pareja, es decir, ac√©ptela, val√≥rela, resp√©tela, dele afecto y ternura, adm√≠rela y compr√©ndala. Eso es todo, √°mela‚Äù. Cuida a tu pareja. No existen expadres, exhermanos, ni hay exfamilias. Tu pareja requiere de cuidado especial para que nunca sea expareja. Por √∫ltimo: ‚ÄúSi le vas a hacer una cirug√≠a a tu mujer para verla m√°s bella, primero hazte una cirug√≠a en el coraz√≥n para tratarla mejor‚Äù.

author: Mike Karolyi
title: Kool-Aid Man Viral Trend Is Back In New York Causing Residents A Lot Of Money
text:
Kool-Aid Man Viral Trend Is Back In New York Causing Residents A Lot Of Money
Did you know that the fruit flavored drink Kool-Aid has been around since the 1920's? The brand's ambassador, Kool-Aid Man, started busting through walls in television commercials in the 1950's and in 2024 the band Bring Me The Horizon even released a song called 'Kool-Aid".
Today there is a, not-so-cool, 'Kool-Aid Man Tik-Tok Challenge, which popped up in New York a few years ago only to return in 2025. This challenge is when, mostly young, people literally run through a neighborhood fence like Kool-Aid Man would but causing real-life property damage.
I recall watching Saturday morning cartoons and seeing Kool-Aid commercials showing a kid yell "hey Kool-Aid" and Kool-Aid Man would bust through the wall of a bowling alley, kid's bedroom, any wall really and say 'oh yeah"!
According to NBC New York the trend is back and busting through fences in New York State.
A busted up fence is not insignificant. Fence pricing varies quite a bit depending on which materials are used, style of fence and how much yard are you fencing in. For an average half-acre property you could pay as much as $10,000 for a new fence.
Whatever happened to kick the can, red light/green light or spirited game of tag?

author: Mehak sirohi
title: 10 times Kris Jenner's fashion choices left fans confused and offended
text:
Kris Jenner's ultimate fashion choices have left fans in a questioning state.
Hollywood's favourite momager, Kris Jenner, has perfected the art of finding the best spotlight for her daughters, but sometimes that mark has missed her. Though Kris's style rarely misses the mark and can be described as bold and maximalist, there have been a few outfits from the past that have left fans confused and questioning.
The diva has definitely had some extremely notable fashion moments in her past, from her Toys For Tots Benefit look from Escada Margaretha in 1990, to a butter yellow Oscar De La Renta number at the 2022 Met Gala, a look ahead of today's trends, Kris has takes the cake in leaving an impact with her bold fashion choices.
Here are 10 times the Kardashian-Jenner Matriarch has left her fans confused and offended:
All Metallic Concert look
Yes, the theme of Beyonce's Renaissance tour was metallics, silver and fringes, but maybe the Jenner mama dropped the ball in this one. The all silver look comprised of a silver trench coat, silver shoes, metallic pants, silver mesh like top, silver bag and, well you get the gist, making the look a tad on the nose, especially for a concert, a simple black or white tee or pants could have cut down the excess and given a nice contrast to the look.
MET Gala 2019
The theme for the 2019 Met Gala was "Camp: Notes on Fashion", and Kris was definitely going for something daring with her Tommy Hilfiger look and platinum blonde bob, but compared to her other iconic MET looks, she may have dropped the ball on this one. The look was quite camp, going with the vibe of every gala, but it was veering more on the side of kitschy than anything else and given the theme, it seemed too costumy.
Kris Jenner during the 2002 ESPY Awards
For the 2002 ESPY (Excellence in Sports Performance Yearly) Awards, the icon attended the event with her ex-partner, Caitlyn Jenner, sporting a lacy little black dress with a signature yellow-and-purple Lakers leather jacket on top. The jacket was for sure on theme for the event, but it might have been a little too adventurous to pair it with a lacy black formal dress. Maybe a pair of black trousers, white shirt and black tie would have worked out better for the overall vibe, especially since the socialite has dropped some major pant suit looks over the years.
Vacation Mode Kris
Though the Jenner mom drops major fashion week, red carpet looks, maybe casual looks are not something she has quite figured out. Decked out in a casual kaftan-style dress on a yacht, Kris was giving full vacation mode. The kaftan was made in the iconic Pucci print fabric and exhibits stunning and vibrant summer colours. However, the look seemed a bit lacklustre when donned by Kris Jenner.
Kris Jenner hot pink pants
Another controversial look of Kris that received quite a bit of backlash from the internet was this hot pink skinny jean look that she wore in 2012. The look consisted of a leather detail jacket, hot pink skinny pants, leopard print booties, square sunglasses and chunky silver jewellery. The outfit was definitely time appropriate with he 2010s statement jewellery pieces and the 2000s reminiscent love for leopard print, however, the look would work more for a 20-year-old Kim. According to one user,
‚ÄúShe is a garish attention-seeker. She dresses too young for her age.‚Äù
Kris's Sportswear look
Maybe sportswear and streetwear are not strong suits for the 69-year-old, as she tried to pair a cardigan with a half-zip hoodie inside. The combination of knitwear with sportswear was definitely brave. The pop of colour overall looked great; however, when closely analysed, something seems amiss. The strings of the hoodie definitely clash against the cardigan.
Kris at the 2010 Primetime Emmy Awards
For the 2010 Primetime Emmy Awards, Jenner was decked out in a one-shoulder patterned black and white belted dress with a black metallic geometric clutch, black chunky earrings, silver studded ring and black peep-toe studded heels. The dress had a retro-esque vibe to it, and the outfit featured many early 2000s trends, but for a red carpet that was as grand as the Emmys, the look was not for lack of a better word grand enough. Granted, the family was still not as big as it is today, and her red carpet style has evolved over the years; Jenner was not a stranger to the grandeur of major event styling.
Jenner at the Last Action Hero Premiere, 1993
Kris Jenner walked the Last Action Hero Premiere carpet with her partner in an all white look that tried to balance a formal carpet look with chunky, kitschy accessories. The all-white ensemble was a combination of an oversized white blazer and loose white trousers, which were very appropriate for the time period. However, the pantsuit was paired with a sheer white top with a V-shaped covering around the chest, making the sleek and chic outfit look a bit gaudy, especially paired with the gold charm waist chain.
Kris at The Hollywood Reporter‚Äôs Women In Entertainment Breakfast, 2015
Decked in an all black gothic look, Jenne was spotted at the 2015 Hollywood Reporter‚Äôs Women In Entertainment Breakfast, wearing Anna K. As much as she likes to dress campy, the look overall didn't make quite a lot of sense, especially given the event and the fact that it was a day program. The design also didn't quite fit right on the entrepreneur, who usually stuns in black. The stockings also felt like overkill.
Kris at the People‚Äôs Choice Awards, 2021
Being a winter event, the momager was definitely dressed for the part in a velvet crimson suit set. However, the lighter shade of the top inside the top added a touch of tackiness to the entire look. A darker top or a contrasting colour would have helped break down the overwhelming impact of the look. She could have also achieved that with a statement bag or chunky rings.
But no matter what, at the end of the day, every celebrity faces fashion faux pas in their very public lives; in fact, it comes with the territory. However, it's more about Kris Jenner's aura and recovery that make her a true style icon.

author: Nicol√°s Angulo
title: NFL: ¬°Problemas en Cincinnati! Ja‚ÄôMar Chase se ausenta al Training Camp de los Bengals por qu√© quiere nuevo contrato | Noticias de M√©xico | El Imparcial
text: NFL: ¬°Problemas en Cincinnati! Ja‚ÄôMar Chase se ausenta al Training Camp de los Bengals por qu√© quiere nuevo contrato ¬øPor qu√© Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase est√° ausente en las pr√°cticas de los Bengals?: Esto es todo lo que necesitas saber sobre la situaci√≥n contractual del receptor de 24 a√±os OHIO. Estados Unidos.- La temporada baja de la NFL ha sido agitada para los receptores abiertos, y Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase no ha sido la excepci√≥n. En medio de rumores sobre un nuevo contrato, el receptor estelar de los Cincinnati Bengals se perdi√≥ su segunda pr√°ctica consecutiva. Esta situaci√≥n se da en un contexto donde los contratos de jugadores clave est√°n en el centro de la atenci√≥n. Bengals WR Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase is not participating at practice for the second straight day.‚Äî Dov Kleiman (@NFL_DovKleiman) He‚Äôs currently seeking a new contract. [pic.twitter.com/stDbsc7WtX] [July 25, 2024] Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase y los Rumores Contractuales - Seg√∫n Kelsey Conway del Cincinnati Enquirer, Chase, que estaba en la banca durante la pr√°ctica, ha estado ausente en los entrenamientos recientes, lo que ha generado especulaciones. - Adam Schefter de ESPN ha reportado que Chase tiene un salario base de $1 mill√≥n de los $4.86 millones totales que ganar√° esta temporada. - El receptor est√° buscando un nuevo acuerdo que refleje su valor en el campo. La Situaci√≥n Contractual de Tee Higgins - Chase no es el √∫nico receptor abierto en el ojo del hurac√°n en Cincinnati. Tee Higgins tambi√©n est√° lidiando con una situaci√≥n contractual complicada. - Higgins jugar√° la temporada 2024 bajo la etiqueta de franquicia despu√©s de no alcanzar un acuerdo para un nuevo contrato. - Aunque no recibi√≥ el intercambio que solicit√≥, ha manifestado su deseo de seguir contribuyendo al equipo, a pesar de la incertidumbre. Zac Taylor said he‚Äôs comfortable with his plan and communication with Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase but wouldn‚Äôt comment specifically on if he expects him to participate in camp at some point and if this is contract related‚Äî Kelsey Conway (@KelseyLConway) [pic.twitter.com/JTs53U0PL4] [July 25, 2024] Comparaci√≥n con otros receptores abiertos - La b√∫squeda de un nuevo contrato por parte de Chase no es sorprendente, especialmente con el reciente mercado de receptores abiertos. - Justin Jefferson renov√≥ su contrato con un promedio de $35 millones por a√±o, mientras que otros receptores como A.J. Brown, Amon-Ra St. Brown y Jaylen Waddle tambi√©n aseguraron extensiones significativas. Desempe√±o de Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase en la NFL - Chase, elegido con la quinta selecci√≥n del draft de la NFL de 2021, ha demostrado ser uno de los receptores m√°s productivos. - Ha superado las 1,000 yardas en cada una de sus tres temporadas y ha sido seleccionado al Pro Bowl en cada una de ellas. - En la temporada pasada, registr√≥ 100 recepciones, 1,216 yardas y siete touchdowns en 16 partidos. Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase ha jugado 3 temporadas para los Bengals. Tiene 268 recepciones para 3,717 yardas y anot√≥ 29 touchdowns. BURROW TO CHASE. 64-YARD TD.‚Äî NFL (@NFL) üì∫: [#HOUvsCIN]on CBS üì±: Stream on [#NFLPlus] [https://t.co/kECSNGbyLL] [pic.twitter.com/ahQEdJBTQ1] [November 12, 2023] Te recomendamos [¬°Oficial! Joe Burrow es dado de alta para recibir contacto total despu√©s de sufrir una rotura de ligamentos en su mu√±eca derecha](/deporte/2024/07/22/oficial-joe-burrow-es-dado-de-alta-para-recibir-contacto-total-despues-de-sufrir-una-rotura-de-ligamentos-en-su-muneca-derecha/) [VIDEO: Joe Burrow sorprende a todos con su participaci√≥n en el desfile de Vogue Par√≠s 2024](/deporte/2024/06/24/video-joe-burrow-sorprende-a-todos-con-su-participacion-en-el-desfile-de-vogue-paris-2024/) [¬°Oficial! Bill Belichick regresar√° a entrenar en la NFL para la pr√≥xima temporada 2025, as√≠ lo confirm√≥ el entrenador de 72 a√±os](/deporte/2024/07/17/bill-belichick-regresara-a-entrenar-en-la-nfl-para-la-proxima-temporada-2025-asi-lo-confirmo-el-entrenador-de-72-anos/) [NFL: Lawrence Taylor ha sido acusado de dos delitos graves por no registrarse como delincuente sexual](/deporte/2024/07/20/nfl-lawrence-taylor-ha-sido-acusado-de-dos-delitos-graves-por-no-registrarse-como-delincuente-sexual/)

author: Andrea Barbuto
title: Sciopero, l‚Äôesperto: sanzioni per imprese e lavoratori se precettazione non rispettata
text:
In questi ultimi giorni, con riferimento allo sciopero generale di oggi, si sta parlando molto di precettazione. Tuttavia, in pochi sanno di che cosa si tratta e cosa comporta il suo mancato rispetto. Per fare chiarezza su questo tema ha risposto Vincenzo Ferrante dello Studio legale Daverio e Florio specializzato in diritto del lavoro e della previdenza. Cosa si intende per precettazione e quando viene attuata Si tratta di un ordine rivolto ai lavoratori, perch√© riprendano il servizio in relazione al quale √® stato proclamato lo sciopero, garantendo in questo modo che l‚Äôastensione si svolga fornendo comunque ai cittadini prestazioni minime. Il potere di precettazione √® attribuito al Presidente del Consiglio dei ministri o a un Ministro da lui delegato (spesso quello dei Trasporti) ovvero al Prefetto , in caso di conflitti locali e deve essere esercitato solo all‚Äôesito di un confronto con i sindacati che hanno proclamato lo sciopero.
L‚Äô ordine di precettazione si pu√≤ anche solo limitare a posporre il momento dello sciopero ad altra data , anche unificando astensioni collettive gi√† proclamate, ovvero anche prevedere la riduzione della sua durata complessiva. Cosa succede se non viene rispettata? Un tempo si prevedeva per i lavoratori una sanzione penale, in quanto ordine dato dall‚Äôautorit√† di governo; la legge del 1990 prevede ora solo una sanzione economica per i lavoratori che, individuati come destinatari, non si presentino al lavoro, stabilendo anche (ad ulteriore tutela del diritto individuale di sciopero) che quanti non ottemperino alla precettazione non possano mai essere licenziati a ragione del solo mancato rispetto dell‚Äôordine ricevuto.
In qualche caso, come a Milano alcuni anni fa, in occasione di uno sciopero dei trasporti, il Sindaco chiese alla procura di perseguire gli autisti per interruzione di pubblico servizio, ma il procedimento fu archiviato per la difficolt√† di individuare esattamente quanti erano stati raggiunti dall‚Äôordine di precettazione, che in genere viene reso noto mediante i media o (utilizzando un sistema che risale ad un passato lontano) attraverso l‚Äôaffissione dell‚Äôordinanza nei luoghi di lavoro, e solo in occasioni eccezionali viene direttamente comunicato ai singoli destinatari. Quali conseguenze ha sui lavoratori e, eventualmente, i sindacati? Sono previste sanzioni economiche non solo per i lavoratori, ma anche per i sindacati e per le associazioni e gli organismi di rappresentanza degli autonomi o dei professionisti e piccoli imprenditori (tassisti, farmacisti, autotrasportatori etc.) che non ottemperino all‚Äôordinanza di precettazione. Poich√© la sanzione √® molto elevata (si pu√≤ arrivare teoricamente anche sino a 50.000 euro) √® abbastanza raro che l‚Äôordine non sia rispettato. Poich√© la legge tutela utenti e cittadini, anche le imprese che non favoriscano la ripresa del servizio possono essere assoggettate a sanzioni.
